PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08742018-06-22NRCAN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectPipeline Financial Requirements Regulations
PrecisApproval of the PIPELINE FINANCIAL REQUIREMENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the establishment of the ‘no-fault’ absolute liability regime for companies operating federally-regulated pipelines; (2) ensure pipeline companies are adequately prepared to cover response, remediation costs, and liability claims, in the event of an unintended or uncontrolled release from their pipelines; and (3) ensure that liability and financial resource requirements for pipeline operators are commensurate with the risks associated with their respective operations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0142 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
